column4: ubuntu/gnome just logged itself out while i was doing work. i would like to know why. i see nothing in dmesg or /var/log/messages
Maybe look in /var/log/Xorg.0.log or /var/log/Xorg.0.log.old to see if X crashed
lines of video modes in the first one and mouse/keyboard in fo in the second. also no timestamps.
Hmm, if the X server crashed it normally leaves something at the bottom of there
